subject: Soccer
Awards, Decorations and Honors
World Cup (Soccer)
Coaches and Managers
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Lloyd and Ellis were named the player and coach of the year in women’s soccer. Lionel Messi received his fifth Ballon d’Or as the top male player.
snippet: Lloyd and Ellis were named the player and coach of the year in women’s soccer. Lionel Messi received his fifth Ballon d’Or as the top male player.
